title: Rupert
brief_description: Join Rupert in twelve timeless stories where Alred Bestall’s evocative illustrations lead you through a doorway to an enchanted world full of excitement, wonder and magic. Meet the little bear’s old chums Bill Badger, Ping-Pong, Tiger-Lily and Jack Frost as well as dragons, sea-serpents and a host of other fanciful creatures in that land not so far away - by the animal underground railway! Rated: G
